SUMMARY: SUMMARY: Datart.cz provides multiple delivery methods within the Czech Republic, including home delivery, bulky item transport, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store collection. International shipping is not offered. Key providers include DPD, Zásilkovna, and Česká pošta (Balíkovna), with a proprietary 'DOPRAVART' service for premium/bulky deliveries. Pricing is free for in-store pickup, starts at 49 Kč for parcel points, 79 Kč for standard home delivery, and 399 Kč for bulky goods. NOTABLE FEATURES: The 'RYCHLART' service enables express in-store pickup (within 30 mins) and home delivery (within 60 mins). The 'DOPRAVART' service allows scheduling delivery for bulky items. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is clearly structured and easy to compare. However, details regarding free shipping thresholds, weekend delivery, and Cash on Delivery (COD) surcharges are missing from the provided page.
